name: Social Media Posts
description: Generate engaging social media content for various platforms

questions.question: Which social media platform are you creating content for?
questions.description: Different platforms have different best practices and character limits

questions.question: What type of content are you creating?
questions.description: The content type will help determine the tone and structure

questions.question: What's the main topic or subject of your post?
questions.description: Be specific about what you want to discuss or share

questions.question: What tone should the content have?
questions.description: The tone will match your brand voice and audience expectations

questions.question: Who is your target audience?
questions.description: Choose from common audiences or enter your own custom audience

questions.question: Do you want to include a call-to-action?
questions.description: A CTA encourages engagement and drives specific actions

questions.question: Do you want to include hashtags?
questions.description: Hashtags help with discoverability and reach

questions.question: How many variations would you like?
questions.description: Choose how many different versions of your prompt to generate (3-20)

templates.name: Educational Post
templates.description: Share knowledge and insights with your audience
templates.template: Create a {tone} social media post about {topic} for {platform}. The post should be educational and informative, targeting {target_audience}. {call_to_action_instruction} {hashtag_instruction}. {variations_instruction}

inputs.call_to_action_instruction: Include a call-to-action asking readers to share their thoughts

examples.output: Create a professional social media post about AI in business for LinkedIn. The post should be educational and informative, targeting business professionals. Include a call-to-action asking readers to share their thoughts. Include 3-5 relevant hashtags
